I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
My cat is my most prized possession.

I enjoy spending my free time reading about different cultures, and learning about the world.
i m allergic to cats.
I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.
I want a home with a large enough space to host my tutoring sessions.
I play the bass guitar because it is a good instrument for someone who is well built and tall.

content.text: Hey there, how is your day going?
It is going pretty well so far, just finished teaching my students. How about you?
I'm doing well, just got home from work. I'm a teacher too.
Oh that's awesome! What grade do you teach?
I teach 5th grade. It's a lot of fun but also a lot of work.
I bet it is! I teach 3rd grade. It's a lot of work but also a lot of fun.
What's your favorite thing about teaching?
My favorite thing about teaching is seeing the excitement on my students' faces when they learn something new.
That's a great answer. My favorite thing is also seeing the excitement on my students' faces when they learn something new.
That's awesome! We sound like we would be great friends.
I have a cat and a dog.
Oh that's awesome! I'm allergic to cats so I can't have one.
That's too bad. Cats are great pets.
I know, right? I wish I could have one.
Well, maybe you can get a hypoallergenic cat someday.
